items.name: The Stitch Up - Book On Board!
Solo Sailor: Morning Meetup
items.introduction: Let us jump-start your morning with coffee — and a mixer to connect you with other solo Sailors.
items.shortDescription: Start your day with fellow solo Sailors.
items.longDescription: BYOC (Bring Your Own Coffee) and enjoy a hit of caffeine with a side of shiny new friendship. At this meetup hosted by our Happenings Cast, you can sip your choice of tea, coffee, or espresso as we discuss the day’s happenings. (And keep an eye out for more chances to mingle with other solo Sailors as the voyage continues).

items.name: Merry Morning Mind Benders
items.introduction: The holiday season is a time for giving. Give yourself the gift of fun when you mingle with fellow Sailors for some low-key morning brain boosters.
items.shortDescription: Wake your brain up (gently) with some games.
items.longDescription: Enjoying the relaxation of your voyage but trying to make sure your mind stays sharp? Come enjoy this holiday brain-teaser session. We'll lay out an array of challenges that includes riddles, anagrams, crosswords, sudoku, geography quizzes, and more — all with a festive holiday twist. Bring a friend, or go solo and make friends while solving a tough crossword clue together.

items.name: VHS Volume 4: Jukebox Jive
items.introduction: Get ready to twist, shake, and shimmy through one of the most playful workouts at sea.
items.shortDescription: Sweat and jive through a retro-fuelled workout.
items.longDescription: Step into a retro-fueled workout with Jukebox Jive! This high-energy, tongue-in-cheek dance class drops Sailors into a pastel-hued, jukebox-fuelled workout inspired by 1950s swing, jive and rock ‘n’ roll. Put a nickel in the Jukebox and get ready to sweat, with our Happenings Cast, through this cult-favorite class with a time-warped twist!
needToKnows: Wear something to move in and close-toed shoes.
Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
By selecting 'add to agenda', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
Seats cannot be reserved or saved.
Keep your hands to yourself!  NO touching of any cast/performer/crew member or Sailor.

items.name: Pickleball
items.introduction: Quick to learn, social, and a lot of fun, Pickleball is a fast-paced sport that combines elements of tennis, badminton, and ping-pong.
items.shortDescription: Discover the world's latest sports obsession.
items.longDescription: Put on some comfy clothes and get ready to break a sweat because you're about to fall in love with Pickleball — the world's latest sports obsession. For this self guided session, all you need to play is a couple of paddles, a ball, and a net, and we got it all ready and waiting for you at the Sports Court on Deck 16. But before joining us for a match, you must know one (very important) thing: learning to play Pickleball is incredibly easy... the hard part is stopping. Trust us, we know.
needToKnows: Pickleball is open to all Sailors on a first come first serve basis.
Please be mindful of your time on the court if others are waiting to play.
This will be a self-guided session.

items.name: Roaming Magic with The Charmer
items.introduction: The Charmer keeps you captivated with his impromptu magic performances around the ship.
items.shortDescription: Casual encounters with the ship's resident charmer
items.longDescription: The Charmer is not only our lady ship's resident magician, but also the consummate host. You may be charmed by the impromptu close-up magic, or perhaps it’s The Charmer’s mystifying personality that draws you in. So keep your eyes peeled; these roaming magic performances throughout the ship can mystify you at the most unexpected moments.

items.name: The Gold Rush Gamble - The Buy In
items.introduction: Your only chance to buy in & win big!
items.shortDescription: BUY IN. PAN FAST. WIN BIG.
items.longDescription: The Gold Rush Gamble is a high-stakes, pay-to-play adventure where trivia, tactics, and sabotage collide! Buy in with your gold for a shot at winning more. From bandits to loose mine-carts, all are welcome just be quick! Buy-ins close before the rush begins. Come on down, take your shot, and strike it rich!
needToKnows: Buy in starts 30 minutes prior to the event.
Buy in ends 5 minutes prior to the event.
There is a cost to play.
This event is first come, first served.

items.name: Dance Class: Broadway Boogie
items.introduction: From the “Cell Block Tango” to the “Room Where it Happens”, this class will having you live your best Broadway dancer life!
items.shortDescription: Learn choreography from your favorite musicals.
items.longDescription: If you ever dreamed of performing famous choreography from top musicals, your dream is about to come true. Enter the stage door as the Balancers breaks down the moves, the counts, and star studded attitude needed to perform like the professionals. This class Can't Stop the Beat, and will have you feeling that Fame and glory!

items.name: The Gold Rush Gamble
items.introduction: Test your wits and luck in a high-stakes, Klondike-inspired gameboard adventure—where only one team claims the cash prize!
items.shortDescription: Strike gold or go bust in this high-stakes gamble.
items.longDescription: The Gold Rush Gamble is a high-stakes, pay-to-play adventure where trivia, tactics, and sabotage collide. Teams battle through Klondike-inspired challenges to earn mining rights on a giant gameboard filled with golden nuggets, cursed relics, jackpots, and traps. Roll the dice, dig for riches, or trigger chaos. With real cash on the line and only one team taking home the prize, it’s a thrilling mix of brains, luck, and betrayal. Will you strike it rich or lose it all in the dust?
needToKnows: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event. The venue will open 15 minutes prior to the event, and space is limited.
By selecting 'book', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
There is a charge for this event.
Entry into the Gamble is only available for purchase in the 30 minutes leading up to the event, and will be done in the event space.

items.name: Kickbox Cardio Blast with The Balancer
items.introduction: Get ready to unleash your energy and have a blast in this high-intensity, equipment-free Kickbox Cardio class!
items.shortDescription: Join the Balancer for a Kickbox Cardio Class.
items.longDescription: This fun equipment-free Kickbox Cardio class combines the power of kickboxing with the intensity of cardio to help you burn calories, tone muscles, and improve your endurance. Perfect for all fitness levels, each session is packed with exciting, easy-to-follow routines, and offer modifications to ensure everyone can participate. With a mix of punches, kicks, and bodyweight exercises, you'll leave feeling empowered, energized, and ready to take on anything!

items.name: Bingo Card Sales
items.introduction: Head to The Red Room prior to bingo to purchase your cards and get the (bingo) party started.
items.shortDescription: Grab your bingo cards before the game.
items.longDescription: Make your way to the stage to purchase as many bingo cards as you want. As you enter, you’ll notice the DJ already has the place bumping and in full party mode — accompanied by gorgeous lighting and videos to set the mood. Trust us; you're going to want in on these games.
needToKnows: Doors open 30 minutes prior to the show.
Bingo Card Sales end 15 minutes prior to the show.
There is a cost to purchase bingo cards.

items.name: Guest Artists: Soulo Lyon Trio
items.introduction: This Trio plays a variety music from top 40, classic rock, Reggae and more!
items.shortDescription: Roots, rhymes, reggae — the rhythm has arrived.
items.longDescription: Roots-rock meets hip-hop meets reggae-soul — can you keep up? It doesn’t matter because when Soulo Lyon Trio takes over, you’ll groove, move, and experience a multitude of rhythms that allow for chilled out dancing to laid back lounging — creating the perfect soundscape all day to all night long.

items.name: Queen HD the DJ at the Aquatic Club
items.introduction: Vibe out in the midday sun with strangers, lovers, and everyone in between.
items.shortDescription: A splash of afternoon sunshine.
items.longDescription: At the Aquatic Club, it's all about good energy. You'll hear a mix of current and classic pop, Latin, reggae, hip-hop (of the chill variety), dance, minimal house music, and remixes. Perfect for poolside lounging — cocktail optional.

items.name: The Charmer's Lounge
items.introduction: Optical illusion or just good old fashioned magic show will be sure to keep you spellbound by The Charmer.
items.shortDescription: Casual encounter with the most charming character.
items.longDescription: The Charmer is not only our lady ship's resident magician, but also the consummate host. You may be charmed by impromptu illusions, or perhaps it’s The Charmer’s mystifying personality that draws you to the show. Or maybe it’s simply your charms that charm The Charmer.
needToKnows: This is event is on a first-come, first-served basis.
We will be using a virtual queue to manage the entrance.

items.name: Bingo with the Hostess
items.introduction: Flutter your false lashes and apply your best red lip...
items.shortDescription: Bingo never looked (and felt) so good.
items.longDescription: Because the Hostess is ready to play. Grab a card (or a few) and make yourself comfortable for a glamorous game of bingo hosted by the most fabulous person on board. Bingo card sales start 45 minutes prior to the event and end 15 minutes prior to the event.
needToKnows: Doors open 30 minutes prior to the show.
Bingo card sales start 45 minutes prior to the event.
Bingo Card Sales end 15 minutes prior to the show.
There is a cost to purchase bingo cards.

items.name: Unique Duo
items.introduction: Experience Unique Duo, Polish artists reimagining hits with jazz, soul, pop & funk.
items.shortDescription: Polish duo reimagines hits.
items.longDescription: Experience Unique Duo, a versatile Polish act blending jazz, soul, pop, funk, and more. With live looping, they reinvent beloved hits into fresh, unforgettable arrangements. Energetic, stylish, and full of charm, this dynamic duo transforms every performance into a one-of-a-kind musical journey.

items.name: The Voyager's Collection: The Finale
items.introduction: You've spent the voyage gathering moments now it’s time to open your Atlas and relive the story you’ve collected.
items.shortDescription: Join the Happenings for the finale of The Search.
items.longDescription: You’ve spent the voyage collecting stamps and stories, now it’s time to reveal your Atlas. Join the Happenings Cast for the finale of The Voyager’s Collection and show us how many faces and places you discovered. Sailors who’ve charted every destination and filled their Atlas will earn a special keepsake to commemorate your journey.

items.name: Mix It Up ($ USD) - Book On Board!
Seas the Knowledge: Progressive Trivia
items.introduction: Play the long game, and test your trivia stamina!
items.shortDescription: Test your trivia knowledge throughout the voyage.
items.longDescription: Enter if you dare our first Progressive Trivia challenge where Sailors will compete daily, and tally scores throughout the entire voyage to crown a winner!

items.name: Delight Trio
items.introduction: Direct from Colombia, the Delight trio presents a wide range of musical genres with a percussive twist.
items.shortDescription: A Latin Trio with a world repertoire.
items.longDescription: Hailing from Colombia Delight Trio's passion for music is as palpable as the energy in their performances. Delight Trio blends music from around the globe including rock, pop, disco, and funk with a danceable mix of bossa nova, Latin, and global rhythms.

items.name: Trivia Night with The Hostess and The Diva!
items.introduction: Your favorite Icon hosts Trivia with their own style and flair!
items.shortDescription: Join the Diva for the ultimate trivia.
items.longDescription: In our love of trivia here at Virgin Voyages, we have enlisted the help of our Diva/ Hostess to attack the game like never before. They will sparkle, and they will shine as YOU bring that heat round after round!

items.name: Unique Duo
items.introduction: Experience Unique Duo, Polish artists reimagining hits with jazz, soul, pop & funk.
items.shortDescription: Polish duo reimagines hits.
items.longDescription: Experience Unique Duo, a versatile Polish act blending jazz, soul, pop, funk, and more. With live looping, they reinvent beloved hits into fresh, unforgettable arrangements. Energetic, stylish, and full of charm, this dynamic duo transforms every performance into a one-of-a-kind musical journey.

items.name: Murder in the Manor
items.introduction: Murder in the Manor is a 80s glam-slasher extravaganza packed with killer looks, fierce dance breaks, and enough synth to wake the dead.
items.shortDescription: A murder mystery soaked in 80s glitz and glamour.
items.longDescription: Welcome to the most fabulous crime scene of the decade. Murder in the Manor isn’t just a show— murder mystery soaked in 80s glitz and dripping with drama. Beneath the shoulder pads and smoky eye lies a deadly secret… and everyone’s a suspect. With over-the-top dance numbers, savage twists, and synth-pop bangers that refuse to die prepare for a glamorously gory night you won’t forget. This isn’t just a whodunit—it’s a who’s-next.
needToKnows: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event. The venue will open at the posted start time, and space is limited.
By selecting 'book', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
Doors will be open 30 minutes prior to the show on a first come first serve basis.
Fog effects will be used.
Just an FYI for those possibly impacted —strobe, lasers and CO2 effects will be used.
Because of the nature of this being an immersive experience, please use caution when moving around the room before, during and after the performance.
Keep your hands to yourself! NO touching of any cast/performer/crew member or Sailor.
For better show enjoyment, doors will be closed once capacity is reached.

items.name: Out of Time
items.introduction: Get ready for a time-hopping, laugh-filled musical comedy at the Red Room.
items.shortDescription: Time-traveling musical comedy with Dr. Vortex!
items.longDescription: Join Dr. Victoria Vortex and her wild time machine as they race through history—from the prehistoric past to the Roaring ’20s, ancient Rome to the Wild West. With music-video-style vignettes, high-energy choreography, and nonstop laughs, this chaotic adventure is packed with nostalgia and fun. Buckle up—it’s a bumpy ride with no roads in sight!
needToKnows: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event.
By selecting 'add to agenda', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.
Seats cannot be reserved or saved.
Strobe effects, sudden noises, and theatrical haze will be used–if this affects anyone from a health perspective, please be advised before attending.

items.name: Guest Artists: Dustin Monk & The Hustle
items.introduction: From turning chairs on "The Voice" to turning heads in the music industry, Dustin Monk & The Hustle brings Hollywood rock experience to Virgin Voyages
items.shortDescription: A rock ensemble with the heartbeat of soul and R&B
items.longDescription: Rising to fame on Season 9 of NBC's "The Voice," Dustin managed to catch the attention and turn the chairs of Blake Shelton and Adam Levine. Now he's doing more than turning chairs -- he's filling them with fans all around the country. Rooted in rock n' roll, the catchy sound of Dustin Monk & The Hustle is also inspired by a fusion of Blues, Soul, Funk, and R&B.

items.name: Quirky Quiz
items.introduction: A fun and quirky quiz game hosted by the Happenings Cast!
items.shortDescription: A new twist on the classic trivia game.
items.longDescription: Get ready for the most unconventional and hilarious trivia game you’ve ever played! Packed with bizarre comparisons, strange facts, and unexpected challenges, this quiz will keep you guessing, laughing, and second-guessing everything you know. From spotting real vs. fake facts to guessing which band name is also an IKEA product, every round is full of surprises. Bring your best guesses and prepare for a wildly fun time!

items.name: Stargazers
items.introduction: Venture out to sea and into the sky with this celestial and romantic evening regaling tales of the stars.
items.shortDescription: A celestial evening of storytelling.
items.longDescription: For one night only, The Dock is transformed into an ethereal and mystical space where the night sky whispers its secrets. You’ll be welcomed to the Dock, which has been transformed into a celestial world, and our Astral Storyteller will begin recalling mythical stories found in the stars. Get completely lost in the night sky and find your way home at Stargazers.
needToKnows: Please keep in mind this is a first come, first served event. The venue will open 15 minutes prior to the event, and space is limited.
By selecting 'book', it does not guarantee admission to the event, so try to arrive when the venue opens to ensure a spot.

items.name: Guest Artist: Selkii
items.introduction: Definition of Selkii-centered 1: able to live-loop tunes from ABBA to Zeppelin 2: capable of providing (a band) for her own needs 3: Selkii-sufficient
items.shortDescription: A one-woman band with an impressive soundscape.
items.longDescription: Live-looping tunes from a catalog of over 1,600 songs, Selkii is a one-woman band with an impressive soundscape. With only her guitar, insane vocals, and mad improvisational skills, she isn't afraid to take a request, spice it up with some Selkii-original flair, and make it her own. And after getting Adam Levine's chair to turn on The Voice 2019, making waves on #TeamBlake, stealing the show on South African IDOL, and getting Macy Gray's praise, she is about to win your heart.

items.name: Murder in the Manor
items.introduction: Murder in the Manor is a 80s glam-slasher extravaganza packed with killer looks, fierce dance breaks, and enough synth to wake the dead.
items.shortDescription: A murder mystery soaked in 80s glitz and glamour.
items.longDescription: Welcome to the most fabulous crime scene of the decade. Murder in the Manor isn’t just a show— murder mystery soaked in 80s glitz and dripping with drama. Beneath the shoulder pads and smoky eye lies a deadly secret… and everyone’s a suspect. With over-the-top dance numbers, savage twists, and synth-pop bangers that refuse to die prepare for a glamorously gory night you won’t forget. This isn’t just a whodunit—it’s a who’s-next.

Doors will be open 30 minutes prior to the show on a first come first serve basis.
Fog effects will be used.
Just an FYI for those possibly impacted —strobe, lasers and CO2 effects will be used.
Because of the nature of this being an immersive experience, please use caution when moving around the room before, during and after the performance.
Keep your hands to yourself! NO touching of any cast/performer/crew member or Sailor.
For better show enjoyment, doors will be closed once capacity is reached.

items.introduction: Get ready for a time-hopping, laugh-filled musical comedy at the Red Room.
items.shortDescription: Time-traveling musical comedy with Dr. Vortex!
items.longDescription: Join Dr. Victoria Vortex and her wild time machine as they race through history—from the prehistoric past to the Roaring ’20s, ancient Rome to the Wild West. With music-video-style vignettes, high-energy choreography, and nonstop laughs, this chaotic adventure is packed with nostalgia and fun. Buckle up—it’s a bumpy ride with no roads in sight!

Strobe effects, sudden noises, and theatrical haze will be used–if this affects anyone from a health perspective, please be advised before attending.

items.name: Karaoke with the Happenings Cast
items.introduction: Sing your heart out, Sailors.
items.shortDescription: It's an onboard karaoke night, Sailors.
items.longDescription: Just by being here on board, you're a bonafide star. Don't even try to fight it, it's the truth. So indulge that very truth and join the Happenings Cast for a wild night of tunes, trills, and togetherness. Everyone has their favorite karaoke song, so come show us yours. And your star power behind it.

items.name: Guest Artist: Kennedi & the Groove
items.introduction: This fearless band isn't afraid to swerve across decades and musical genres during live sets that cover everything from funk, to pop and disco.
items.shortDescription: Funk, pop, disco, and rock hits sung with soul.
items.longDescription: Kennedi & The Groove has its origins at sea in 2021. On board a Cruise Ship where Kennedi met the four piece band that will later be known as The Groove. The connection was instant and together they created a headliner show and started to work on their repertoire with the goal of working on cruises. After a 3 month period in a 5 star hotel in South Korea, they were able to achieve what they've been working towards for almost 2 years, a contract with Virgin Voyages.

items.name: Club Night Featuring Guest DJ James Campbell
items.introduction: Spinning every rhythm with his mad skills and magnetic vibes, James Campbell creates a unique open-format and wrap-around party experience.
items.shortDescription: Bringing the dancing heat to the seafaring beat.
items.longDescription: Hï Ibiza, Café Mambo, Amnesia. DJ James Campbell has played at them all. With a mix of commercial dance, chart, disco beats, house music, hip-hop, R&B, and the ultimate party classics, James was tipped as one of the island's 'Biggest Up & Comers' by Ibiza Club News. And after 5 summers with residencies in Ibiza Rocks, Pukka Up, O Beach, and Nikki Beach, he's bringing those vibrant island vibes on board for an electrifying party at The Manor.
